adiutor-inform-creator-help: Di yi niŋ ka bi pii li, bɛ ni ti ŋun daa yoogi yaɣili ŋɔ lahabali.
adiutor-speedy-deletion-request-complete: Yomyom yihibu soli nyɛla din daa naai!
adiutor-page-proposed-for-deletion: Yaɣili nyɛla bɛ ni daa wuhi ni di yihima
adiutor-protection-policy-title-help: Din bɔŋɔ nyɛla zalikpani gura yaɣili piligu.
adiutor-revision-deletion-policy-title-h: Din bɔŋɔ nyɛla labimaliniŋ zalikpani yaɣili
adiutor-revision-reporting-warning: Pɔi ka a piligi "tool" ŋɔ zaŋ suhi, di to ni yi ti ŋun su yɛltɔɣa ŋɔ lahabali zaŋ jɛndi Wikipedia zalikpana. Yɛl'gola din be chiriŋ maliniŋ ni a ni tooi suhi m-bo ka bi doli din wuhiri lahabali soli ŋɔ.
adiutor-rev-enable-help: Di yi niŋ ka gbaŋ ŋɔ ni polo ŋɔ yi piligi tuma, lala labimaliniŋ ŋɔ nyɛla din yɛn piligi tuma.
adiutor-rev-incomplete-request-details: Pahimi suɣulo mali dihitabili ni a piigi piligu daliri shɛli ka sabi a daliri.
